name: Eclipse
description: Eclipse is an SVM L2 on Ethereum. Eclipse combines the performance of Solana with the user and liquidity base of Ethereum, providing the best of both worlds. Over the long term, Eclipse is building the Giga Scale Virtual Machine (GSVM), a new SVM client. GSVM will be a software-hardware co-designed, cross-layer optimized, GigaCompute blockchain. To date, Eclipse has over $200M in TVL, a peak production TPS of nearly 9,000 and 1M active wallets.
